name: hyper-cutter

effect.x_y: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.x_y: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
